engine

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.WorldObject
      • engine.Unit
        • engine.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnitImpacter

    public class Enemy
extends Unit
implements UnitImpacter
    An Enemy is a Unit that runs towards a target and explodes, inflicting damage, upon reaching it but dies in the process.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Enemy(double x, double y, double radius, int health, double speed, Unit target)
      Creates a new Enemy.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isRelevantTarget(Unit u)
      Checks if the given unit could be hit by this UnitImpacter and therefore if it is worth checking the Unit for impact.
      void onImpact(Unit u)
      Executes the effects that should happen on the impacted Unit when this UnitImpacter hits it.
      void onTick()
      Moves the Enemy towards its' given target.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(double x,
     double y,
     double radius,
     int health,
     double speed,
     Unit target)
        Creates a new Enemy.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-position of the Enemy.
        y - The x-position of the Enemy.
        health - The initial health of the Enemy.
        radius - The radius of the Enemies' circular shape.
        speed - The speed which the Enemy runs towards its' target.
        target - The target the Enemy runs towards.

    • Method Detail

      • onTick

        public void onTick()
        Moves the Enemy towards its' given target. IF it's knockbacked it will be knockbacked without any standard movement.
        Specified by:
        onTick in class WorldObject

      • onImpact

        public void onImpact(Unit u)
        Description copied from interface: UnitImpacter
        Executes the effects that should happen on the impacted Unit when this UnitImpacter hits it.
        Specified by:
        onImpact in interface UnitImpacter
        Parameters:
        u - The Unit that has been hit.

      • isRelevantTarget

        public boolean isRelevantTarget(Unit u)
        Description copied from interface: UnitImpacter
        Checks if the given unit could be hit by this UnitImpacter and therefore if it is worth checking the Unit for impact.
        Specified by:
        isRelevantTarget in interface UnitImpacter
        Parameters:
        u - The unit to check.
        Returns:
        True if the Unit could be hit by the UnitImpacter, returns false otherwise.
